body_content.explanation: something that you say, write, or give that shows your respect and admiration for someone, especially on a formal occasion:
examples: Tributes have been pouring in from all over the world for the famous actor who died yesterday.
Floral tributes (= flowers given to show respect for someone who has died) piled up at the scene of the accident.
The minister paid tribute to the men who had fought the blaze.

body_content.explanation: to show clearly how good, strong, or effective something or someone is:
examples: I've never met a five-year-old as well behaved as your son - he's a tribute to you!
